info.name: HelpWanted3613A2
info.description:
Ensure the \[host\] collection variable is set before running collection tests.  
  
Running the Login routes for either Staff or Admin will automatically store the generated token in the \[accessToken\] variable.

When running requests individually, ensure you first run Login Admin before running admin routes, or Login Staff before running staff routes, as routes are protected based on role.

item.name: Initialize

request.description: Initializes the database

item.description: Contains the initialize route which runs before all other requests during a collection run.

request.description: Logs in as an Admin user

Creates a new Admin user with the given username and password.  
Default: username: "admin_test", password: "securepass"

Creates a new Staff user with the given username and password.  
Default: username: "staff_test", password: "mypassword"
Schedules a new shift for the given staff ID, specifying the StartTime and EndTime of the shift in "YYYY/mm/DD HH-MM" format
Generates and stores a new report for the current week

query.description: Retrieves all the shifts for the specified date for the Staff user

request.description: Returns all shifts for a given staff member. If a date is specified, only returns shifts on that given date

query.description: Retrieves all the shifts for the specified date for the Staff user
Retrieves all the shifts for the specified date for the Staff user

request.description: Lists all admin names and IDs
Lists all Staff names and IDs
Lists all Report IDs and the date they were generated on
Returns the details of the Staff user with the given ID
Returns the combined roster for the current week. If a date is specified, returns the roster for the week corresponding to that date.

query.description: Shows the roster for the week corresponding to the date specified
